nodes.text: The Jixuan desert was a desert located in the southern hemisphere of the planet Ryloth. It was taken by Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi during the Battle of Ryloth, allowing the planet's southern hemisphere to fall under Galactic Republic control.

The Jixuan desert first appeared as a hologram in "Liberty on Ryloth," the twenty-first episode of the canon animated series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on March 13, 2009.
